name: Death is Inevitable (Red Fusion Games)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam in 72 hours. This is a game that we thought we had plenty of time for, and of course waited till the last minute to do all the major things. We think it's still fun. Hope you enjoy!

Your goal is to escape Death, in a never-ending "Temple Run"-style game. Avoid obstacles, and be careful- Death is always right behind you and will catch any mistake you make (or any bugs in the game).
